intro: Merge cats, discover new adorable kittens and reach the highest score possible!
description:
Welcome to MeowMatch – a place full of adorable kitties where each move lets you reveal new lovely cats.


DISCOVER THEM ALL
Each matched pair of the same cat unlocks a new one. To make this task easier, try to remember the order of matching. Those cute fluffy creatures are waiting to be uncovered. Can you find them all?


EACH MOVE MATTERS
The game mechanics are based on the 2048 game, so every move you make might cause you to lose. Look at the board, analyze the current arrangement, try to predict how the elements will behave, and make your move.


KEY FEATURES:
- Many cute kittens
- 14 colorful backgrounds to choose
- Meow-tastic soundtrack
